Uses of Class
io.sphere.sdk.models.SphereException

  • Packages that use SphereException 
    Package Description
    io.sphere.sdk.client
    Provides types to connect to the platform via HTTPS.
    io.sphere.sdk.json
    Provides utils the JSON mapping from and to the platform.

    • Uses of SphereException in io.sphere.sdk.client

      Subclasses of SphereException in io.sphere.sdk.client 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BadGatewayException
      On the server occurred a problem, try again later.
      class  BadRequestException
      HTTP code 400 response from the platform.
      class  ClientErrorException
      Exceptions for commercetools platform http responses with an error code 4xx.
      class  ConcurrentModificationException
      HTTP code 409 response.
      class  ErrorResponseException
      Typical exception for bad requests containing error information.
      class  ForbiddenException
      The commercetools platform received the request but refuses to process it, typically to insufficient rights.
      class  GatewayTimeoutException
      This error might occur on long running processes such as deletion of resources with connections to other resources.
      class  InternalServerErrorException
      An exception has been thrown on the server side.
      class  InvalidClientCredentialsException
      Exception for the case that projectKey/cliendId/clientSecret are invalid.
      class  InvalidTokenException
      Exception raised in case the access token is not valid for the used commercetools platform project.
      class  NotFoundException
      Known causes: Updating an object which does not exist (anymore)
      class  RequestEntityTooLargeException
      HTTP code 413 response from the platform.
      class  ServerErrorException
      The platform answered with a HTTP response code of >= 500.
      class  ServiceUnavailableException
      The platform is currently not available.
      class  SphereDeprecationException
      Exception thrown by DeprecationExceptionSphereClientDecorator in case a deprecated feature of the commercetools platform is used.
      class  SphereServiceException
      Exception thrown when the platform responds
      with a status code other than HTTP 2xx.
      class  SphereTimeoutException
      Unchecked exceptions for timeouts in the JVM SDK.
      class  UnauthorizedException
      Unauthorized access to the commercetools platform with either invalid client credentials or tokens.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JsonException
      Exception concerning JSON.
